[configuration] A terminal program for Linux and other unix-like systems. -b, --baudrate : set baudrate (ignore the value from config) -D, --device : set device name (ignore the value from config) -s, --setup : enter setup mode -o, --noinit : do not initialize modem & lockfiles at startup -m, --metakey : use meta
